events.name: lithium-ion recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: Concentration of mineral processing capacity
events.wd_description: Mineral processing capacity is heavily concentrated in Asia, particularly in China. This concentration extends to lithium carbonate, cobalt refinery capacity, manganese, and nickel sulphate markets.
events.description: Mineral processing capacity is heavily concentrated in Asia, particularly in China. This concentration extends to lithium carbonate, cobalt refinery capacity, manganese, and nickel sulphate markets.

events.name: Lithium carbonate processing
events.wd_description: China accounts for 47% of lithium carbonate processing capacity.
events.description: China accounts for 47% of lithium carbonate processing capacity.

events.name: Cobalt refinery capacity
events.wd_description: China holds a significant portion of the global cobalt refinery capacity.
events.description: China holds a significant portion of the global cobalt refinery capacity.

events.name: Manganese and nickel sulphate processing
events.wd_description: China also dominates the processing capacity for manganese and nickel sulphate.
events.description: China also dominates the processing capacity for manganese and nickel sulphate.

events.name: Concentration of mineral processing capacity in Asia
events.description: A large portion of mineral processing capacity, including lithium carbonate and cobalt refinery, is concentrated in Asia, particularly China.

events.name: Dependence on China for mineral processing
events.description: Despite strategic investments, countries like the US still rely on China for processing mined ores due to a lack of domestic capacity.
